refnamediv.refpurpose: A markup tag for use by 'macro stylesheets'.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This control marks the enclosed content for special processing in the 'macro stylesheet' whose name is specified by 'style' attribute of v:page element.

formalpara.title: name
formalpara.para: Optional name of the control which could be used in the macro expansion stylesheet assigned.

formalpara.title: debug-srcfile
formalpara.para: URI of the source document where the tag comes from.

formalpara.title: debug-srcline
formalpara.para: Line number in the source document where the tag comes from.

formalpara.title: debug-log
formalpara.para: This defines what sort of data are saved to the debugging log.
